alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 6:37PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Beaverhead County through 700 PM MDT... At 636 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 20 miles southeast of Jackson, or 20 miles west of Dillon, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dillon, Bannack, Beaverhead Rock State Park, Bannack State Park and Glen. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 51 and 84 . MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall may also lead to minor localized flooding and debris flow in steep terrain. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southwestern Montana.
